verses.verse: Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7891>sang<s%> this <S%H7892>song<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H559><s%> "I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he has <S%H1342>triumphed<s%> <S%H1342>gloriously.<s%> The <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%> he has <S%H7411>thrown<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

<S%H3050>Yah<s%> is my <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2176>song.<s%> <S%H2088>He<s%> has become my <S%H3444>salvation.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is my <S%H410>God,<s%> and I will praise <S%H1>him;<s%> my father's <S%H430>God,<s%> and I will exalt <S%H7311>him.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

He has <S%H3384>cast<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H4818>chariots<s%> and his <S%H2428>army<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> His <S%H4005>chosen<s%> <S%H7991>captains<s%> are <S%H2883>sunk<s%> in the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea.<s%>
The <S%H8415>deeps<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H3381>them.<s%> They went down into the <S%H4688>depths<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H68>stone.<s%>

Your right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> is <S%H142>glorious<s%> in <S%H3581>power.<s%> Your right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> dashes the <S%H341>enemy<s%> in <S%H7492>pieces.<s%>

In the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of your <S%H1347>excellency,<s%> you <S%H2040>overthrow<s%> those who rise up <S%H6965>against<s%> <S%H7971>you.<s%> You send forth your <S%H2740>wrath.<s%> It <S%H398>consumes<s%> them as <S%H7179>stubble.<s%>

With the <S%H7307>blast<s%> of your <S%H639>nostrils,<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H6192>piled<s%> <S%H5140>up.<s%> The floods stood <S%H5324>upright<s%> as a <S%H5067>heap.<s%> The <S%H8415>deeps<s%> were <S%H7087>congealed<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

The <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7291><s%> 'I will pursue. I will <S%H5381>overtake.<s%> I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil.<s%> My <S%H5315>desire<s%> shall be <S%H4390>satisfied<s%> on <S%H7324>them.<s%> I will draw my <S%H2719>sword,<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall destroy <S%H3423>them.<s%>'
You <S%H5398>blew<s%> with your <S%H7307>wind.<s%> The <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H6749>them.<s%> They sank like <S%H5777>lead<s%> in the <S%H117>mighty<s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

Who is like <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, among the <S%H410>gods?<s%> Who is like <S%H142>you,<s%> glorious in <S%H6944>holiness,<s%> <S%H3372>fearful<s%> in <S%H8416>praises,<s%> <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H6382>wonders?<s%>
You stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> your right <S%H3225>hand.<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> swallowed <S%H1104>them.<s%>

<S%H2617>"You,<s%> in your loving kindness, have <S%H5148>led<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2098>that<s%> you have <S%H1350>redeemed.<s%> You have <S%H5095>guided<s%> them in your <S%H5797>strength<s%> to your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5116>habitation.<s%>
The <S%H5971>peoples<s%> have <S%H8085>heard.<s%> They <S%H7264>tremble.<s%> <S%H2427>Pangs<s%> have taken <S%H270>hold<s%> on the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H6429>Philistia.<s%>

<S%H227>Then<s%> the <S%H441>chiefs<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%> were <S%H926>dismayed.<s%> <S%H7461>Trembling<s%> takes <S%H270>hold<s%> of the mighty <S%H352>men<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%> All the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> are melted <S%H4127>away.<s%>

<S%H367>Terror<s%> and <S%H6343>dread<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> on <S%H1419>them.<s%> By the greatness of your <S%H2220>arm<s%> they are as <S%H1826>still<s%> as a <S%H68>stone<s%>â€” until your <S%H5971>people<s%> pass <S%H5674>over,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> until the <S%H5971>people<s%> pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2098>who<s%> you have <S%H7069>purchased.<s%>

You shall <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H5193>in,<s%> and plant them in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> the <S%H4349>place,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which you have <S%H6466>made<s%> for yourself to dwell <S%H3427>in;<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> which your <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H3559>established.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5703>forever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever.<s%>"

For the <S%H5483>horses<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> with his <S%H7393>chariots<s%> and with his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> brought <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on <S%H1121>them;<s%> but the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> on <S%H3004>dry<s%> land in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

<S%H4813>Miriam<s%> the <S%H5031>prophetess,<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H8596>tambourine<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and all the <S%H802>women<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> her with <S%H8596>tambourines<s%> and with <S%H4246>dances.<s%>

<S%H4813>Miriam<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7891>them,<s%> "Sing to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he has <S%H1342>triumphed<s%> <S%H1342>gloriously.<s%> The <S%H5483>horse<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%> he has <S%H7411>thrown<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> led <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>onward<s%> from the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H7793>Shur;<s%> and they <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> no <S%H4325>water.<s%>

When they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4785>Marah,<s%> they <S%H3201>couldn't<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> from the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4785>Marah,<s%> for they were <S%H4751>bitter.<s%> Therefore its <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4785>Marah.<s%>
The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "What shall we <S%H8354>drink?<s%>"

Then he <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3384>showed<s%> him a <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and he <S%H7993>threw<s%> it into the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were made <S%H4985>sweet.<s%> There he <S%H7760>made<s%> a <S%H2706>statute<s%> and an <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> for <S%H5254>them,<s%> and there he tested them;

and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "If you will <S%H8085>diligently<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and will <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his <S%H238>eyes,<s%> and will pay attention to his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> all his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> I will <S%H7760>put<s%> none of the <S%H4245>diseases<s%> on <S%H7760>you,<s%> which I have put on the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> for I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who heals <S%H7495>you.<s%>"

They <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H362>Elim,<s%> where there were <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H5869>springs<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H7657>seventy<s%> palm <S%H8558>trees:<s%> and they <S%H2583>encamped<s%> there by the <S%H4325>waters.<s%>
